languages.text: Сквозь сияние портала на вас взирает огромный глаз. Нет, портал и есть глаз чего-то огромного. И пасть заодно, ждущая, пока вы добровольно в нее войдете.
An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.
languages.original_text: Сквозь сияние портала на вас взирает огромный глаз. Нет, портал и есть глаз чего-то огромного. И пасть заодно, ждущая, пока вы добровольно в нее войдете.

traits.locale_text: An enormous eye is staring at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.
An enormous eye is staring at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.
An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.
An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.
An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.

languages.text: 一只巨大的眼睛透过发光的传送门，盯着你……或者更确切地说，这扇传送门就是某只庞然大物的眼睛和巨口，正在耐心地等着你走进去。
languages.original_text: An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.

traits.locale_text: 一只巨大的眼睛透过发光的传送门，盯着你……或者更确切地说，这扇传送门就是某只庞然大物的眼睛和巨口，正在耐心地等着你走进去。

languages.text: 光を放つポータルから無数の目がこちらを見ている…というよりは、ポータル自体が何か巨大なものの目のようだ。そしてその吸い込み口があなたが入ってくるのをじっと待っている。
languages.original_text: An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.

traits.locale_text: 光を放つポータルから無数の目がこちらを見ている…というよりは、ポータル自体が何か巨大なものの目のようだ。そしてその吸い込み口があなたが入ってくるのをじっと待っている。

languages.text: Un œil immense vous fixe à travers le portail luisant... ou, pour être plus précis, le portail est l'œil de quelque chose d'immense. Et sa gueule attend patiemment que vous le franchissiez.
languages.original_text: An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.

traits.locale_text: Un œil immense vous fixe à travers le portail luisant... ou, pour être plus précis, le portail est l'œil de quelque chose d'immense. Et sa gueule attend patiemment que vous le franchissiez.

languages.text: Un enorme ojo te observa a través del portal resplandeciente... o, mejor dicho, el portal es el ojo de algo enorme. Sus fauces esperan pacientemente a que accedas a su interior.
languages.original_text: An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.

traits.locale_text: Un enorme ojo te observa a través del portal resplandeciente... o, mejor dicho, el portal es el ojo de algo enorme. Sus fauces esperan pacientemente a que accedas a su interior.

languages.text: Ein riesiges Auge starrt dich durch das leuchtende Portal an ... oder das Portal ist das Auge von etwas Riesigem. Und sein Schlund wartet geduldig, dass du ihn betrittst.
languages.original_text: An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.

traits.locale_text: Ein riesiges Auge starrt dich durch das leuchtende Portal an ... oder das Portal ist das Auge von etwas Riesigem. Und sein Schlund wartet geduldig, dass du ihn betrittst.

languages.text: Parıldayan portalın içinden devasa bir göz sana bakıyor. Daha doğrusu portal, devasa bir şeyin gözü gibi görünüyor. Ağzı da sabırla içine girmeni bekliyor.
languages.original_text: An enormous eye stares at you through the glowing portal... or rather, the portal is the eye of something enormous. And its maw, patiently waiting for you to step inside.

traits.locale_text: Parıldayan portalın içinden devasa bir göz sana bakıyor. Daha doğrusu portal, devasa bir şeyin gözü gibi. Ağzı da sabırla içine girmeni bekliyor.
